title: Yay ultimateskin, umm
body: if i were to craft the skin new ultimate skin for lux would i be able to buy the rest of the special bundle which cost almost 4k rp? :3

replies.body: The bundle should be flexible, so if you unlock the skin now then you can obtain the rest later.  The bundle will be available for a short period though, and may disappear on December 13, 2016 per the [Elementalist Lux FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/233073948-Elementalist-Lux-FAQ#h1q2).  Hope that helps!
